short.name: Priority
short.info: when multiple listeners are in different sound environments in split screen, the combined environment will be the one with the highest priority

float.name: Room Intensity High Frequency
float.info: intensity of the room effect above the High Frequency Reference

float.name: Room Rolloff
float.info: how quickly the room effect rolls off

float.name: High Frequency Reference
float.info: for high frequency values, what value defines high frequency
